original_text: And the strong shall be as tow, and the maker of it as a spark, and they shall both burn together, and none shall quench them.
korean_text: 강한 자는 삼오라기 같고 그의 행위는 불티 같아서 함께 탈 것이나 끌 사람이 없으리라

sentences.original_text: And the strong shall be as tow
and the maker of it as a spark
sentences.korean_translation: 그것을 만든 자는 불꽃처럼 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: and they shall both burn together
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 둘 다 함께 탈 것이며
